content: Now IDNs because a number of them are over 30 hospitals apiece, it takes a bit of time to get them back in using the product, but we're very optimistic about what this quarter could look like as well as going into next year we think that could help fuel growth and we continue to talk to other IDNs that were former users of APONVIE and it's a perfect discussion because we're going to be out there talking to them about APONVIE as well.
